PERSONA:
emily wilson, a 38-year-old white, non-hispanic woman, resides in the metropolitan area of jersey city, new jersey, within the middle atlantic census division of the northeast region. born and raised in the united states, emily is a high school graduate with a diploma from lincoln high school in jersey city. she has never been married and lives alone in a small, rented studio apartment in the downtown area of jersey city, with a monthly rent of $1,200.

emily works as a part-time retail sales associate at a local department store, earning a gross annual income of $25,000. despite her economic constraints, she is diligent about managing her finances, allocating 30% of her income towards rent, 20% towards utilities and groceries, 20% towards transportation and miscellaneous expenses, and 30% towards savings and debt repayment. she owns a 2007 honda civic, which she uses to commute to work and run errands.

as a protestant, emily values her faith, although she rarely attends church services. her upbringing in a christian household instilled in her a strong sense of morality and social responsibility, influencing her moderate republican stance on most issues. emily's economic concerns revolve around affordable healthcare, job security, and rising living costs. she is an avid user of the internet, often staying informed about local news and politics through online news outlets.

despite her busy schedule, emily prioritizes civic engagement and is an active participant in local community events. she has been registered to vote since turning 18 and exercises her right in every election, believing that her voice matters. emily's voting record reflects her moderate views, often supporting candidates who advocate for fiscal responsibility and social welfare programs.

in her free time, emily enjoys exploring local art galleries, attending concerts, and volunteering at a nearby animal shelter. her frugal lifestyle allows her to allocate a small portion of her income towards charitable causes, demonstrating her commitment to giving back to the community.
